General.Name: Goyal Aluminiums Limited
General.Description: Goyal Aluminiums Limited engages in the trading business in India. The company deals in aluminium extruding profiles, aluminium sheets and coils, aluminium expended profiles, aluminium scraps, cotton fabric trousers, lithium ion cells, pop rivets, rubber profiles, and expended metal products. It also manufactures aluminium panels and its allied products. The company was formerly known as Advitiya Trade India Limited and changed its name to Goyal Aluminiums Limited in October 2021. Goyal Aluminiums Limited was incorporated in 2017 and is based in New Delhi, India.
